column4: i have ubuntu 7.10 and i need help installing drivers, and software
What do you need?
i cannot get my ATI graphics card driver instaled
Which card?
a moblity radeon (ATI) 1400
a moblity radeon (ATI) 140
Did you just install Ubuntu?  And have you done your updates yet?
yes i just installed the newest version but i dont know how 2 update
Get all your updates first...then the instructions for installing the latest ATI drivers can be found here:  http://wiki.cchtml.com/index.php/Ubuntu_Gutsy_Installation_Guide
My advice would be to NOT use the restricted drivers manager, as it holds an outdated version of the ATI driver...you'd need to install XGL to make anything work, and that's a mess.
how do i get the latest updates
what do to get the driver installed, i have downloaded it from the site
how do i get the latest drivers, and get everything working correctly

grab all your system updates first, before installing the new driver.  Open a terminal and type in "sudo apt-get update", no quotes...it'll prompt you for your password, then refresh your repository info.
ok, this is prob. noob but where is the terminal
Applications/Accessories/Terminal
okay, after that what do i do?
Go to System/Administration/Update Manager...open that and follow the prompts.
it just says download 6 files, says something else than finishes
what now man, i did the updates
what is GRUB
